subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The fourth-seeded Badgers made 10 of 18 3-point attempts and cruised to their sixth consecutive opening-round victory in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The fourth-seeded Badgers made 10 of 18 3-point attempts and cruised to their sixth consecutive opening-round victory in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
